item.title: EP 770 - Who Creates The Ghosts?: The Phantom Of East Tennessee State University
item.itunes:title: Who Creates The Ghosts?: The Phantom Of East Tennessee State University
item.description:
Today we uncover a scam, try to save young girls from whirling lights, and then we meet a ghost that never existed!
